channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: It took 10+ years to map the 302 neurons in a roundworm's brain by tracing the wiring by hand. Our #AI algorithms, coupled with TensorStore have enabl...
item.description:
It took 10+ years to map the 302 neurons in a roundworm's brain by tracing the wiring by hand.

Our #AI algorithms, coupled with TensorStore have enabled us to reconstruct bigger brains of more complex creatures.

More on the latest research ‚Üí https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VSG3_JvnCkU
item.author: Google AI

item.title: ‚ÄúThese AI tools enable us to study systems at a scale that wasn't possible before," says @k0mal_singh of Google Research, on our partnership with @Ge...
item.description: ‚ÄúThese AI tools enable us to study systems at a scale that wasn't possible before," says @k0mal_singh of Google Research, on our partnership with @GeenaDavisOrg. Help us create a future where everyone feels seen on (and off) screen. ‚Üíhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2EDiHryKwwE
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Can AI help us understand representation in media? Google Research uses #AI to analyze media content to uncover hidden patterns in representation, and...
item.description:
Can AI help us understand representation in media?

Google Research uses #AI to analyze media content to uncover hidden patterns in representation, and we partnered with the @GeenaDavisOrg & @USC to inform a more equitable media landscape. Learn more ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/4bkDr0z
item.author: Google AI

item.title: We're back w/ Research@ London üá¨üáß, which covered a range of research projects, from PaliGemma, our open vision language model, to Med-Gemini, AI...
item.description:
We're back w/ Research@ London üá¨üáß, which covered a range of research projects, from PaliGemma, our open vision language model, to Med-Gemini, AI for Breast Cancer, Genomics, Health Equity LLM Toolbox, & Connectomics.

Here's a big round of applause for our speakers & attendees!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today on the blog, we demonstrate the feasibility & benefits of learning from human feedback for text-to-image generation by obtaining rich human feed...
item.description: Today on the blog, we demonstrate the feasibility & benefits of learning from human feedback for text-to-image generation by obtaining rich human feedback, then training a model to predict this feedback to enable improved image generation. Learn more ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/4c9i2Zz
item.author: Google AI

item.title: That's a wrap on Research@ Munich! Speaker sessions highlighted advancements in AI, climate, health, privacy, & quantum computing. Research@ is a For ...
item.description:
That's a wrap on Research@ Munich!

Speaker sessions highlighted advancements in AI, climate, health, privacy, & quantum computing. Research@ is a For Researcher, By Researcher event series; thank you to all for the engaging presentations & discussions ‚Üíhttps://goo.gle/4cjONmM
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Introducing the Meeting Information Seeking Dialogs dataset (MISeD), which can be used to fine-tune model agents that support natural language convers...
item.description: Introducing the Meeting Information Seeking Dialogs dataset (MISeD), which can be used to fine-tune model agents that support natural language conversations about meeting recordings, so users can catch up on meetings they may have missed. Learn more at https://goo.gle/4caXu2O
item.author: Google AI

item.title: RT Google for Startups: Introducing the 2024 Google for Startups Founders Fund recipients in the U.S.! From preventing wildfires to revolutionizing ho...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇGoogle for Startups
Introducing the 2024 Google for Startups Founders Fund recipients in the U.S.!
From preventing wildfires to revolutionizing how businesses secure data, these visionary Black and Latino-led startups harness AI to drive meaningful change. https://goo.gle/founders-funds
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 2:30 PM for a demo on how you can make your own maps of the continental US, Indonesia, and Malaysia at int...
item.description: Drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 2:30 PM for a demo on how you can make your own maps of the continental US, Indonesia, and Malaysia at interactive speed without needing any experience in machine learning, remote sensing, or satellite data!
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to the authors of the ‚ÄúRich Human Feedback for Text-to-Image Generation‚Äù paper, which received the #CVPR2024 Best Paper Award. Check...
item.description: Congratulations to the authors of the ‚ÄúRich Human Feedback for Text-to-Image Generation‚Äù paper, which received the #CVPR2024 Best Paper Award. Check out the paper at: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2312.10240
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Congratulations to @zhengqi_li, Richard Tucker, @Jimantha, and @holynski_. Their paper ‚ÄúGenerative Image Dynamics‚Äù received the #CVPR2024 Best Paper...
item.description: Congratulations to @zhengqi_li, Richard Tucker, @Jimantha, and @holynski_. Their paper ‚ÄúGenerative Image Dynamics‚Äù received the #CVPR2024 Best Paper Award. Read the paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2309.07906
item.author: Google AI

item.title: At 3:45 PM today, the #CVPR2024 Google booth will host @hbXNov and @YonatanBitton for a talk on how VideoCon provides a framework to curate high-quali...
item.description: At 3:45 PM today, the #CVPR2024 Google booth will host @hbXNov and @YonatanBitton for a talk on how VideoCon provides a framework to curate high-quality video-text data ‚Äì enabling video-centric learning, and comprehensive coverage of semantic variations.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 2:30 PM to learn about PaliGemma, a lightweight open vision-language model inspired by PaLI-3. Don‚Äôt miss...
item.description: Stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 2:30 PM to learn about PaliGemma, a lightweight open vision-language model inspired by PaLI-3. Don‚Äôt miss an opportunity to see an interactive demo that showcases PaliGemma‚Äôs capabilities.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today at 1:30 PM, stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth, where @jparkerholder & @YugeTen will present Genie, a foundation model trained exclusively from ...
item.description: Today at 1:30 PM, stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth, where @jparkerholder & @YugeTen will present Genie, a foundation model trained exclusively from Internet videos that can generate an endless variety of action-controllable 2D worlds given image prompts.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Visit the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 12:30 PM to hear @natanielruizg describe how HyperDreamBooth can take a single input image and personalize a...
item.description: Visit the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 12:30 PM to hear @natanielruizg describe how HyperDreamBooth can take a single input image and personalize a text-to-image diffusion model 25x faster than DreamBooth by leveraging HyperNetworks.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: At @CVPR and want to learn about research careers at Google? Visit the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 10 AM to meet Google Research Recruiter, Rachel...
item.description: At @CVPR and want to learn about research careers at Google? Visit the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 10 AM to meet Google Research Recruiter, Rachel Dean, to discuss opportunities and the hiring process.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: With OpenMask3D, you can search 3D scenes using free-form text queries. Drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 3:45 PM for a demo with @fedassa a...
item.description: With OpenMask3D, you can search 3D scenes using free-form text queries. Drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 3:45 PM for a demo with @fedassa and @FrancisEngelman on using visual-language models to achieve open-vocabulary 3D instance segmentation.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today at 2:30 PM, drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth, where Yang Zhao will demonstrate an efficient on-device text-to-image generation approach that u...
item.description: Today at 2:30 PM, drop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth, where Yang Zhao will demonstrate an efficient on-device text-to-image generation approach that uses Diffusion GANs.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: TacticAI provides soccer experts & coaches with tactical insights, particularly on corner kicks, through predictive and generative AI. Visit the #CVPR...
item.description:
TacticAI provides soccer experts & coaches with tactical insights, particularly on corner kicks, through predictive and generative AI. Visit the #CVPR2024 Google booth today at 1:30 PM to hear @PetarV_93
describe how TacticAI achieves impressive results.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today at 12:30 PM, stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth for a Q&A session on Medical AI Research. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to meet @AziziShekoofeh, w...
item.description: Today at 12:30 PM, stop by the #CVPR2024 Google booth for a Q&A session on Medical AI Research. Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to meet @AziziShekoofeh, who has 4+ years of experience leading various health-related efforts, such as Med-PaLM and Med-Gemini.
item.author: Google AI
